title: Chapter VI - Special Housing Units
content:
Chapter VI - Special Housing Units

State Regulations

Part 300 - General Provisions (§ 300.1 to 300.3)

Part 301 - Special Housing Unit Admissions (§ 301.1 to 301.9)

Part 302 - Admission Procedure (§ 302.1 to 302.3)

Part 303 - Post-admission Adjustment (§ 303.1 to 303.7)

Part 304 - Services (§ 304.1 to 304.14)

Part 305 - Controls/restrictions/restraints (§ 305.1 to 305.6)

Part 306 - Other Special Housing Units (§ 306.1)

Part 310 - Special Housing Unit Case Management Committee (§ 310.1 to 310.3)

Part 315 - Residential Rehabilitation Units (§ 315.1 to 315.2)

Part 316 - Step-down Units (§ 316.1 to 316.3)

Part 319 - MENTAL ILLNESS (§ 319.1 to 319.3)

Part 320 - Residential Mental Health Units (§ 320.1 to 320.5)

Part 321 - JUVENILE SEPARATION UNITS (RESCINDED)

Part 330 - Protective Custody Status Incarcerated Individuals (§ 330.1 to 330.6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
